properties.name: operation
properties.description: Copy a file

properties.name: Delete
properties.description: Delete a file

properties.name: Download
properties.description: Download a file

properties.name: List
properties.description: List files and folders

properties.name: Share
properties.description: Share a file

properties.name: Update
properties.description: Update a file

properties.name: Upload
properties.description: Upload a file

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.description: The ID of the folder

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: File name. Ex: data.pdf.

properties.name: useQueryString
properties.description: Whether a query string should be used to filter results

properties.name: queryString
properties.description: Query to use to return only specific files

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: queryFilters
properties.description: Filters to use to return only specific files

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value for operation

properties.name: emailAddress
properties.description: The email address of the user or group to which this permission refers

properties.name: domain
properties.description: The domain to which this permission refers

properties.name: allowFileDiscovery
properties.description: Whether the permission allows the file to be discovered through search

properties.name: binaryData
properties.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field

properties.name: fileContent
properties.description: The text content of the file to upload

properties.name: keepRevisionForever
properties.description: Whether to set the 'keepForever' field in the new head revision. This is only applicable to files with binary content in Google Drive. Only 200 revisions for the file can be kept forever. If the limit is reached, try deleting pinned revisions.

properties.name: trashed
properties.description: Whether to move a file to the trash. Only the owner may trash a file.

properties.name: ocrLanguage
properties.description: A language hint for OCR processing during image import (ISO 639-1 code)

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: The ID of the parent to set

properties.name: useContentAsIndexableText
properties.description: Whether to use the uploaded content as indexable text

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name the file should be saved as

properties.name: parents
properties.description: The IDs of the parent folders which contain the file

properties.name: enforceSingleParent
properties.description: Whether to opt in to API behavior that aims for all items to have exactly one parent. This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive.

properties.name: fields
properties.description: All fields

properties.name: moveToNewOwnersRoot
properties.description:
This parameter only takes effect if the item is not in a shared drive and the request is attempting to transfer the ownership of the item.

When set to true, the item is moved to the new owner's My Drive root folder and all prior parents removed.

properties.name: sendNotificationEmail
properties.description: Whether to send a notification email when sharing to users or groups

properties.name: supportsAllDrives
properties.description: Whether the requesting application supports both My Drives and shared drives

properties.name: transferOwnership
properties.description: Whether to transfer ownership to the specified user and downgrade the current owner to a writer

properties.name: useDomainAdminAccess
properties.description: Whether to perform the operation as domain administrator, i.e. if you are an administrator of the domain to which the shared drive belongs, you will be granted access automatically.

properties.name: spaces
properties.description: All spaces

properties.name: corpora
properties.description: All files in "My Drive" and "Shared with me"

properties.name: allDrives
properties.description: All drives

properties.name: driveId
properties.description: ID of the shared drive to search. The driveId parameter must be specified if and only if corpora is set to drive.

properties.name: Get
properties.description: Get a drive

properties.name: canChangeCopyRequiresWriterPermissionRestriction
properties.displayName: Can Change Copy Requires Writer Permission Restriction
properties.description: Whether the current user can change the copyRequiresWriterPermission restriction of this shared drive

properties.name: canChangeDomainUsersOnlyRestriction
properties.displayName: Can Change Domain Users Only Restriction
properties.description: Whether the current user can change the domainUsersOnly restriction of this shared drive

properties.name: canChangeDriveBackground
properties.description: Whether the current user can change the background of this shared drive

properties.name: canChangeDriveMembersOnlyRestriction
properties.displayName: Can Change Drive Members Only Restriction
properties.description: Whether the current user can change the driveMembersOnly restriction of this shared drive

properties.name: canComment
properties.description: Whether the current user can comment on files in this shared drive

properties.name: canCopy
properties.description: Whether the current user can copy files in this shared drive

properties.name: canDeleteChildren
properties.description: Whether the current user can delete children from folders in this shared drive

properties.name: canDeleteDrive
properties.description: Whether the current user can delete this shared drive. Attempting to delete the shared drive may still fail if there are untrashed items inside the shared drive.

properties.name: canDownload
properties.description: Whether the current user can download files in this shared drive

properties.name: canEdit
properties.description: Whether the current user can edit files in this shared drive

properties.name: canListChildren
properties.description: Whether the current user can list the children of folders in this shared drive

properties.name: canManageMembers
properties.description: Whether the current user can add members to this shared drive or remove them or change their role

properties.name: canReadRevisions
properties.description: Whether the current user can read the revisions resource of files in this shared drive

properties.name: canRename
properties.description: Whether the current user can rename files or folders in this shared drive

properties.name: canRenameDrive
properties.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive

properties.name: canShare
properties.description: Whether the current user can rename this shared drive

properties.name: canTrashChildren
properties.description: Whether the current user can trash children from folders in this shared drive

properties.name: colorRgb
properties.description: The color of this shared drive as an RGB hex string

properties.name: createdTime
properties.description: The time at which the shared drive was created (RFC 3339 date-time)

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Whether the shared drive is hidden from default view

properties.name: restrictions
properties.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

properties.name: copyRequiresWriterPermission
properties.description: Whether the options to copy, print, or download files inside this shared drive, should be disabled for readers and commenters. When this restriction is set to true, it will override the similarly named field to true for any file inside this shared drive.

properties.name: domainUsersOnly
properties.description: Whether access to this shared drive and items inside this shared drive is restricted to users of the domain to which this shared drive belongs. This restriction may be overridden by other sharing policies controlled outside of this shared drive.

properties.name: driveMembersOnly
properties.description: Whether access to items inside this shared drive is restricted to its members

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: propertiesUi
properties.description: A collection of arbitrary key-value pairs which are visible to all apps
